Name: Kontext (CLARIN.SI)
Description: This is the CLARIN.SI installation of LINDAT's KonText, comprised of the KonText front-end developed by the Czech National Corpus team and the Manatee back-end, developed by Lexical Computing. This installation offers over 50 richly annotated corpora in Slovenian and other languages. Shibboleth log-in is supported.
